NewsItem.HEADLINE: Carrier Unlicensed Radios 2018 Forecast Update 1 (Excel File) with Research Notes (PDF)
NewsItem.SUMMARY: This semi-annual update provides a five-year forecast for LAA, LWA, Multefire, and Carrier Wi-Fi investments worldwide.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: Analysis of cost for deployment, capacity enhancement, and the match with various business models----all are included in this report. The six month update provides bullet notes on what has changed in the last six months.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: LAA LWA WiFi Wi-Fi Multefire CBRS
